channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Miracles in Motion
channel.desc: Join Greg and Jill Morikone on Miracles in Motion for a compelling episode titled Victory in Jesus, featuring powerful reenactments of divine interventions that changed lives forever. Hear the story of Andy, whose midnight cable hack led him to a life-altering encounter with God. Lourdes, in San Juan, Puerto Rico, found 3ABN when she was at her lowest point, contemplating suicide, and heard a message that changed everything.
